project.name: Hawaii Department of Human Services Systems Modernization Project
project.description: The project involves the modernization of systems for the Hawaii Department of Human Services, focusing on the implementation of the BES Pilot and addressing DHS Change Requests.

issues.title: High SIT Failure Rate
issues.description: The System Integration Testing (SIT) failure rate for Epics ranges from 51% to 83%, with the highest being eligibility client correspondence, at 83%. There are over 800 defects found in SIT, possibly impacting the Projectâ€™s ability to enter Final Acceptance Testing (FAT).
issues.remedy: Address defects and improve testing processes.

issues.title: Incomplete SSP Documentation
issues.description: The Independent Security Assessment team has requested 60 documents supporting the System Security Plan (SSP), highlighting the risk of the SSP and supporting documentation not being completed for federal reviews.
issues.remedy: Complete and submit required SSP documentation.

issues.title: Schedule Variances Increasing
issues.description: The schedule variances are increasing, with some task completion dates delayed twenty days or more, potentially revealing unexpected complexity and an increased level of effort.
issues.remedy: Reassess schedule and adjust resources to meet deadlines.

issues.title: Security Findings Unresolved
issues.description: 80 security findings remain unresolved, delaying approval from federal data sources.
issues.remedy: Prioritize remediation of security findings to meet required timeframes.

issues.title: Requirements Management Delays
issues.description: Increased meeting frequency has delayed the development of the Requirements Traceability Matrix.
issues.remedy: Streamline meetings to expedite RTM development.

issues.title: Interface Testing Incomplete
issues.description: Functional and technical testing of interfaces did not progress, impacting SIT readiness.
issues.remedy: Complete interface testing to ensure SIT readiness.

issues.title: Testing Process Challenges
issues.description: Defects from past UAT activities remain unresolved, affecting future testing effectiveness.
issues.remedy: Revise testing processes to enhance effectiveness and reporting.

issues.title: FNS Approval Delays
issues.description: Delays in obtaining FNS approval for eDRS interface may impact SIT readiness.
issues.remedy: Obtain Form #674 approval to proceed with eDRS interface testing.

issues.title: High Defect Count
issues.description: The project has been focused on resolving the high number of defects in the Final Acceptance Testing cycle.

issues.title: Delayed Deliverables
issues.description: Contract required Deliverables to include the final Requirements Traceability Matrix (RTM) and Conversion results were not delivered on their due dates.
issues.remedy: Ensure timely delivery of required documents.

issues.title: Security Assessment Pending
issues.description: The BES third-party security assessment report was recently submitted, with 34 critical and 204 high findings.
issues.remedy: Complete security awareness training for DHS.

events.name: Final Acceptance Testing Start
events.description: FAT for BES 1.0 scheduled to start.

events.name: System Integration Testing
events.description: Preparation for System Integration Testing (SIT) planned to begin on June 23, 2025.

events.name: BES Pilot Start
events.description: Discussions to possibly delay the start of the BES Pilot.
